params.token: The token to set the fees.

setPenaltyRate(uint256).details: The penalty rate is represented as base points (expressed as a uint256) That will be applied to the enrollment fee when a distributor quits.

params.newPenaltyRate: The new penalty rate to be set. It should be a value representing base points (bps).

params.newTreasuryAddress: The new address of the treasury.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw or address(0) to withdraw native tokens.

approve(address).notice: Approves the data associated with the given identifier.

getTreasuryAddress().notice: Gets the current address of the treasury.

isActive(address).notice: Checks if the entity associated with the given identifier is active.

isBlocked(address).notice: Checks if the entity associated with the given identifier is blocked approval.

isWaiting(address).notice: Checks if the entity associated with the given identifier is waiting approval.

quit(address).notice: Allows an entity to quit and receive a penalized refund.

register(address).notice: Registers data with a given identifier.

revoke(address).notice: Revokes the registration of an entity.

setFees(uint256).notice: Sets a new treasury fee.Only the owner can call this function.

setFees(uint256,address).notice: Sets a new treasury fee.Only the owner can call this function.

setPenaltyRate(uint256).notice: Function to set the penalty rate for quitting enrollment.

setTreasuryAddress(address).notice: Sets the address of the treasury.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws tokens from the contract to the owner's address.This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws tokens from the contract to the owner's address.This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.
